page.title: 10MEDIA
page.content: Most houses in this area have a tele- phone,a radio and TV.Newspapers are delivered morning and evening.{The {NEWS}is the local evening paper.{TVS} is the local TV company,based in Southampton,with 5.5 million daily viewers.The other three channels are national,although {BBC South}has some local programmes.{Radio Victory}is based in Portsmouth and claims a weekly audience of 268000. Free newspapers,such as {Streetlife} , are distributed once a week on a Thursday.They contain less news than a daily paper and more adverts.Many local shops sell a huge variety of weekly and monthly magazines on many subjects.Video shops have opened in all areas,hiring out hundreds of films every night(average cost:Â£1).There is only one bookshop in Havant.
